I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Record input_before_output_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_input_before_output_interface { output_implies_input_before_output : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> input_before_output client id tr } Arguments input_before_output_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_input_before_output_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Inductive raft_output (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := NotLeader : clientId -> nat -> raft_output | ClientResponse : clientId -> nat -> output -> raft_output Arguments raft_output {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments NotLeader {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope Arguments ClientResponse {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
in_import_in_trace_O : forall (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key), In (O k) (import tr) -> exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ (exists o : output, In (ClientResponse (fst k) (snd k) o) os)
get_input = fix get_input (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key) {struct tr} : option input := match tr with | [] => None | (_, inl (ClientRequest c id cmd)) :: xs => if sumbool_and (c = fst k) (c <> fst k) (id = snd k) (id <> snd k) (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) (Nat.eq_dec id (snd k)) then Some cmd else get_input xs k | (_, inl Timeout) :: xs | (_, inr _) :: xs => get_input xs k end : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> key -> option input Arguments get_input _%list_scope
in_input_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists h : name, In (h, inl (ClientRequest client id i)) tr : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_input_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
IR_equivalent_acknowledge_all_ops_func : forall (K : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ir : list (IR K)), good_trace K ir -> forall l : list (op K), (forall k : K, In (O k) l -> In (IRO k) ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) l) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) l) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> ~ In (O k) l) ->...-> IR_equivalent K (acknowledge_all_ops_func K K_eq_dec l ir) ir
equivalent_intro : forall K : Type, (forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list (op K)) (ir : list (IR K)), good_trace K ir -> (forall k : K, In (O k) l -> In (IRO k) ir) -> (forall k : K, In (IRO k) ir -> In (O k) l) -> (forall k : K, In (IRU k) ir -> In (I k) l) -> (forall k k' : K, In (I k') l -> before (O k) (I k') l -> before (IRO k) (IRI k') ir) -> (forall k : K, In (O k) l -> before (I k) (O k) l) ->...-> equivalent K l ir
key_in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ key_in_output_list client id os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments key_in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
get_output' = fix get_output' (os : list raft_output) (k : key) {struct os} : option output := match os with | [] => None | NotLeader _ _ :: xs => get_output' xs k | ClientResponse c id o :: xs => if sumbool_and (c = fst k) (c <> fst k) (id = snd k) (id <> snd k) (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) (Nat.eq_dec id (snd k)) then Some o else get_output' xs k end : list raft_output -> key -> option output Arguments get_output' _%list_scope
in_output_trace = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (o : output) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => exists (os : list raft_output) (h : name), In (h, inr os) tr /\ in_output_list client id o os : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> output -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments in_output_trace {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%list_scope
good_trace_IRI_in : forall (K : Type) (ir : list (IR K)), good_trace K ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (IRO k) ir \/ In (IRU k) ir
input_before_output = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => before_func (is_input_with_key client id) (is_output_with_key client id) tr : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments input_before_output {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops (K : Type) : list (op K) -> list (IR K) -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops K [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list (op K)) (out : list (IR K)), ~ acknowledged_op K k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops K tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops K (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_nil _%type_scope Arguments AAO_IU _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
get_output = fix get_output (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) (k : key) {struct tr} : option output := match tr with | [] => None | (_, inl _) :: xs => get_output xs k | (_, inr os) :: xs => match get_output' os k with | Some o => Some o | None => get_output xs k end end : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> key -> option output Arguments get_output _%list_scope
output_before_input = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (client' : clientId) (id' : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))) => before_func (is_output_with_key client id) (is_input_with_key client' id') tr : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> clientId -> nat -> list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) -> Prop Arguments output_before_input {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _%list_scope
raft_input_ind : forall P : raft_input -> Prop, P Timeout -> (forall (c : clientId) (n : nat) (i : input), P (ClientRequest c n i)) -> forall r : raft_input, P r
raft_input_rec : forall P : raft_input -> Set, P Timeout -> (forall (c : clientId) (n : nat) (i : input), P (ClientRequest c n i)) -> forall r : raft_input, P r
raft_input_sind : forall P : raft_input -> SProp, P Timeout -> (forall (c : clientId) (n : nat) (i : input), P (ClientRequest c n i)) -> forall r : raft_input, P r
raft_input_rect : forall P : raft_input -> Type, P Timeout -> (forall (c : clientId) (n : nat) (i : input), P (ClientRequest c n i)) -> forall r : raft_input, P r
before_head_op : forall (K : Type) (l : list (op K)) (h : K) (ir : list (IR K)), (forall k1 k2 : K, In (I k2) l -> before (O k1) (I k2) l -> before (IRO k1) (IRI k2) (IRI h :: ir)) -> forall x : op K, In (I h) l -> before x (I h) l -> exists k : K, x = I k
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

raft_net_invariant_timeout = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (h : name) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleTimeout h (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_timeout {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
StepFailureDiskOp_input : forall (h : do_name) (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (ops : list (disk_op file_name)) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (do_name * do_msg)), ~ In h failed -> do_input_handlers h inp (nwdoState net h) = (ops, out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := do_send_packets h l ++ nwdoPackets net; nwdoState := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoState net) h d; nwdoDisk := update do_name_eq_dec (nwdoDisk net) h (apply_ops (nwdoDisk net h) ops) |} -> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)] where ?P0 :...
Inductive exported (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> Prop := exported_nil : exported env_i env_o [] [] | exported_IO : forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr ->...-> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRU k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr) Arguments exported (_ _)%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments exported_nil (_ _)%function_scope Arguments exported_IO (_ _)%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments exported_IU (_ _)%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope
exported_IO : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> exported env_i env_o (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> network -> Prop Arguments applied_implies_input_state {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
is_input_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl (ClientRequest c i _) => (if clientId_eq_dec client c then true else false) && (id =? i) | _ => false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_input_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
key_in_output_trace_dec : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (tr : list (name * (raft_input + list raft_output))), {key_in_output_trace client id tr} + {~ key_in_output_trace client id tr}
RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
exported_sind : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (P : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) ->...-> P l l0
exported_ind : forall (env_i : key -> option input) (env_o : key -> option output) (P : list (IR key) -> list (input * output) -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (k : key) (i : input) (o : output) (l : list (IR key)) (tr : list (input * output)), env_i k = Some i -> env_o k = Some o -> exported env_i env_o l tr -> P l tr -> P (IRI k :: IRO k :: l) ((i, o) :: tr)) ->...-> P l l0

raft_invariant_handle_input : forall (P : network -> Prop) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> handleInput h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (nwPackets net) \/ In p' (send_packets h l)) -> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net...
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
doGenericServer = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (h : name) (state : raft_data) => let (out, state0) := applyEntries h state (rev (filter (fun x : entry => (lastApplied state <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? commitIndex state)) (findGtIndex (log state) (lastApplied state)))) in (out, RaftState.set_raft_data_lastApplied term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state0 (if lastApplied state0 <? commitIndex state0 then commitIndex state0 else lastApplied state0), []) : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list raft_output * raft_data * list (name * msg) Arguments doGenericServer {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface aiii : applied_implies_input_interface copi : causal_order_preserved_interface iboi : input_before_output_interface oci : output_correct_interface ogii : output_greatest_id_interface |- Type] ?rel : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface aiii : applied_implies_input_interface copi : causal_order_preserved_interface iboi : input_before_output_interface oci : output_correct_interface ogii : output_greatest_id_interface |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
StepFailure_input : forall (h : Net.name) (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (nwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets h l ++ nwPackets net; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(h, inl inp); (h, inr out)]
is_output_with_key = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (trace_entry : name * (raft_input + list raft_output)) => let (_, s) := trace_entry in match s with | inl _ => false | inr os => if key_in_output_list_dec client id os then true else false end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> name * (raft_input + list raft_output) -> bool Arguments is_output_with_key {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope

```coq
intros tr k H.
induction tr as [| [h [c | os]] tr IHtr]; intros H.
- contradiction H.
- destruct c; simpl in H.
  + destruct (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) eqn:Heq_cid.
    * destruct (Nat.eq_dec n (snd k)) eqn:Heq_n.
      { exists h, i. left. simpl in H. rewrite Heq_cid, Heq_n in H. inversion H. reflexivity. }
      { apply IHtr. assumption. }
    * apply IHtr. assumption.
  + apply IHtr. assumption.
- simpl in H. destruct os.
  + apply IHtr. assumption.
  + destruct (dedup op_eq_dec (filterMap (fun x => match x with | NotLeader _ _ => None | ClientResponse c n _ => Some (O (c, n)) end) l)) as [| a os'] eqn: Hh.
    * apply IHtr. simpl in H. assumption.
    * apply in_app_or in H. destruct H.
      { apply in_dedup_iff in H. rewrite Hh in H. destruct H as [H _]. inversion H. }
      { apply remove_all_in_iff in H. destruct H as [H _]. apply IHtr. assumption. }
```

original: intros tr k H. induction tr as [| [h [c | os]] tr IHtr]; intros H. - contradiction H. - destruct c; simpl in H. + destruct (clientId_eq_dec c (fst k)) eqn:Heq_cid. * destruct (Nat.eq_dec n (snd k)) eqn:Heq_n. { exists h, i. left. simpl in H. rewrite Heq_cid, Heq_n in H. inversion H. reflexivity. } { apply IHtr. auto. } * apply IHtr. auto. + apply IHtr. auto. - simpl in H. destruct os. + apply IHtr. auto. + destruct (dedup op_eq_dec (filterMap (fun x => match x with | NotLeader _ _ => None | ClientResponse c n _ => Some (O (c, n)) end) l)) as [| a os'] eqn: Hh. * apply IHtr. simpl in H. auto. * apply in_app_or in H. destruct H. { apply in_dedup_iff in H. rewrite Hh in H. destruct H as [H _]. inversion H. } { apply remove_all_in_iff in H. destruct H as [H _]. apply IHtr. auto. }
